description: Try our easy to follow Indian-Style Scrambled Eggs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Scrambled eggs,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg,Low sugar,Sesame free,Mushroom,High protein,High fibre,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Indian-Style Scrambled Eggs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat grill to high. Line a baking tray with foil. Place mushrooms, stem side up, on prepared tray. Spray with oil. Season. Grill for 5-7 minutes, turning once, until tender. Add bread to tray for last 2 minutes and cook until toasted and warmed through.
Meanwhile, whisk eggs and milk in a large jug. Season with pepper.
Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic, cumin, ground coriander, turmeric and half the chilli. Cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until softened and fragrant.
Add egg mixture to pan and, using a spatula, gently move the mixture around in a folding motion for 5-6 minutes or until just set.
Serve egg and mushrooms with warmed naan breads. Top with tomato, coriander sprigs and remaining chilli.
